materials.raw_text: P: 60 g, Pa: 40 g, Tc: 90 g, Zr: 30 g

sourcing.instructions: P (Phosphorus) - Chemical suppliers or online chemical vendors; Pa (Palladium) - Precious metal suppliers or online marketplaces; Tc (Technetium) - Specialized isotope suppliers; Zr (Zirconium) - Metal suppliers or online materials stores.

1. Measure out 60 g of Phosphorus (P) using a precision scale. 2. Measure 40 g of Palladium (Pa). 3. Measure 90 g of Technetium (Tc). 4. Measure 30 g of Zirconium (Zr). 5. In a clean, dry mixing container, combine P, Pa, Tc, and Zr thoroughly using a non-reactive stirrer until a uniform mixture is achieved.
preparation.raw_text: 1. Measure out 60 g of Phosphorus (P) using a precision scale. 2. Measure 40 g of Palladium (Pa). 3. Measure 90 g of Technetium (Tc). 4. Measure 30 g of Zirconium (Zr). 5. In a clean, dry mixing container, combine P, Pa, Tc, and Zr thoroughly using a non-reactive stirrer until a uniform mixture is achieved.
